title: Am I Having Sex With Too Many People? – Love & Sex Stuff
description:
Submit your questions here!:
http://www.kindafunny.com/loveandsex


Do you. And whoever else you wanna do. This week Tim and Nick dive into a very prominent issue in modern dating.

Each and every Monday at 9AM PST Tim Gettys and Nick Scarpino answer your questions about dating and relationship advice....cause that sounds like a good idea.


Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino



Music by Tonedeff - http://www.QN5.com

She should be shamed, but that is that is **** and like honestly everybody should do their part in changing that. Like, that is a problem with society right now is that we see this thing as like "Oh, women having sex is bad." It's like, no, women having sex is a thing; sex is something that people really enjoy, and it's like, why shouldn't men have that and women don't? Right. And also how are you supposed to get good at it if you don't practice it? What I tell my wife every day. For me personally, I think it's really really important when you're in your 20s to experiment, to have fun, to experience sex as much as you can, and to me that does mean having more than just one partner. Now again if you have someone that you're in love with and you you guys are in a committed relationship, there's nothing wrong with having sex with only one person. To answer your question, Tanya, dude, you know what I mean? And you do those other guys too; yeah, that's what you and whoever you want you are.
